thread.title: Watch what happens next after Pat Phelan killed Andy Carver on Coronation Street
thread.title_full: Watch what happens next after Pat Phelan killed Andy Carver on Coronation Street

author: Katie Fitzpatrick
title: Watch what happens next after Pat Phelan killed Andy Carver on Coronation Street
text:
Watch what happens next after Pat Phelan killed Andy Carver on Coronation Street Phelan loads his van concealing evidence, just as Eileen appears on tomorrow night's Corrie Share Click to play Tap to play The video will start in 8 Cancel Play now Andy Carver hopes to get away with the attack Share this video Get soaps updates directly to your inbox + Subscribe Thank you for subscribing! Could not subscribe, try again later Invalid Email 
Coronation Street viewers were reeling in shock after evil builder Pat Phelan appeared to brutally kill Andy Carver on Friday night. 
Phelan was seen smashing a laptop down on Andy’s head after he discovered that he had vital evidence proving that he was behind a dodgy flats scheme. 
And it looks like he can now be counted as one of Corrie’s most notorious killers along with Richard Hillman and John Stape. 
Tomorrow night Phelan loads his van with the rest of Andy’s belongings and manages to close the doors concealing the evidence, just as Eileen appears. But where is Andy's body? Coronation Street viewers were reeling in shock after evil builder Pat Phelan appeared to brutally kill Andy Carver on Friday night (Photo: ITV) 
Some fans reacted in disbelief that Andy, played by Oliver Farnworth, really could be dead. And they seem to think there’s a chance he could still turn up alive. Read More 
One fan tweeted: “Unless we see a dead body, I’ve a Phelan Andy is alive. See what I did there?” Phelan forced Andy to burn down Kevin Webster's garage (Photo: ITV) 
Another stunned viewer, unable to believe what they had just seen, asked: “Wait...so Andy’s dead?” 
But other fans are convinced that Phelan has carried out his darkest deed yet, especially because he turned up for his wedding day to Eileen Grimshaw, late, flustered, with his shoes covered in mud. This points towards him burying Andy’s body on his way to the service. Andy was ridden with guilt over the fire (Photo: ITV) 
When Phelan walked in on him looking at the laptop, Andy was rumbled. And his dreams of starting a new life in Portugal with girlfriend Steph were shattered. Read More 
Pretending to be Andy, Phelan sent the waitress a text message to say he wasn’t coming. Is Andy dead? (Photo: ITV) 
Monday night’s double bill started with a disturbing dream sequence which showed Andy attempt to clobber Phelan with a wooden beam. But no matter how many times he tried, Phelan grew taller and even more imposing. 
It seems that this was a sign of shocking scenes to come. 
Played by Connor McIntyre, Phelan first grabbed our attention, and turned stomachs, as villainous Phelan in 2013. It looks like he can now be counted as one of Corrie’s most notorious killers (Photo: Publicity Picture) 
So evil he is simply known as ‘Phelan’, he fleeced the Windass family and blackmailed a terrified Anna, played by Debbie Rush, into sleeping with him. And he wrecked her relationship with Owen Armstrong his former client and business partner when the disgusting revelation drove them apart. 
He then made a sensational return when he landed a building job with mechanic Kevin and turned his attention to Michael Rodwell, played by Les Dennis. 
After stealing his woman Eileen he teamed up with his old pal Vinny in a dodgy building scheme to to rip off hopeful homeowners and con them out of their hard earned cash.\ Where has Phelan hidden Andy's body? (Photo: ITV) 
Poor Michael, with Anna’s help, tried to uncover the secret but when Phelan caught up with him, the pair had a scrap which led to Michael suffering a heart attack. 
Instead of getting help, Phelan stood over him and taunted him as he died. 
Andy worked out that Phelan was involved in Michael’s death and when he attacked Phelan in revenge, the builder retaliated with blackmail. Like us on Facebook
